name: Orange vs EVIL
description:
An alarming amount of crimes have been committed by the criminal group known as EVIL(Every Veggy is Lemons). None other than you, Orange, have the seed-shooting ability and resilient peel required to stand up to them. You are the last hope against these healthy menaces. Can you defeat them and face the Source of their power?

You can move with the arrow keys. You shoot automatically in the direction you're facing when your seed reloading completes. Click on upgrades to make the Orange stronger, and click on a Veggy to choose it as your next opponent. Defeat six of them and you will face the Source of of EVIL, the Sun. BGM and some voice acting is included and can be toggled from the sound menu. The five screenshots on this page are basically what the sequence of events will be like for the majority of runs.

This game is a two-man collaboration made for fun. If you want it to continue, please let us know what you'd like to see. We love making weird ideas come to fruition, almost as much as I love bad puns.

(Game made in 2 weeks for the Lowrez GameJam 2022)
